name: Real Drifting - Modified Car Drift and Race Pro
name_original: Real Drifting - Modified Car Drift and Race Pro
description:
Go out on each track and enjoy the freedom of drifting. By the end of every round, you earn money due to your performance. Purchase and build your own Drift car, with custom body parts, performance upgrades and paintjobs.

MONEY
-You can spend your hard earned money on cars, and upgrades

9 CARS (more coming in updates):
-AE86
-E30
-E36
-S2000
-RX8
-911
-Panamera
-Camaro
-Mustang

5 TRACKS ALL BOTH DAY AND NIGHT (more coming in updates!):
-Practice spot
-Shanghai
-Utah
-GYMKHANA
-Trackwood

CUSTOM BODY PARTS
-Custom front and rear bumpers
-Spoilers
-Exhausts
-15 rims to select from and more to come.

PERFORMANCE UPGRADES
(Each Upgrade has 3 stages)
-Suspension upgrade (lower ride height)
-Body weight (decrease the cars weight and automatically equip Racing Seats and Roll Cage)
-Engine tuning

PAINTJOBS
-18 different colors for both the car and the rims.

This game truly has the most realistic handling, and controlling the car is both fun and challenging, but if you've played realistic games before, this would be no challenge for you!

***iPhone 4S users have to reboot device to be able to play the game, otherwise it will crash***
